Key.Original: It seems that you joined a game in progress, the group you are assigned to is:
Key.English: It seems that you joined a game in progress, the group you are assigned to is:
Key.French: Il semblerait que vous ayez rejoint la partie en cours. Votre groupe d'originine est:

Key.Original: Select the group you wish to join:
Key.English: Select the group you wish to join:
Key.French: Selectionnez le groupe que vous désirez rejoindre:

Key.Original: Select the player from this group you wish to rejoin:
Key.English: Select the player from this group you wish to rejoin:
Key.French: Selectionnez le joueur de ce groupe auprés duquel vous désirez spawner:

Key.Original: <t color = '#F91515' > Warning: if you select a dead player you will be teleported to respawn bunker!</t>
Key.English: <t color = '#F91515' > Warning: if you select a dead player you will be teleported to respawn bunker!</t>
Key.French: <t color = '#F91515' > Attention: Si vous selectionnez un joueur déjà mort vous serez spawné dans le respawn bunker!</t>

Key.Original: there's room left in the vehicle.
Key.English: there's room left in the vehicle.
Key.French: il reste de la place dans le véhicule.

Key.Original: Selected player's vehicle is full, please select another player
Key.English: Selected player's vehicle is full, please select another player
Key.French: Le joueur sélectionné est dans un véhicule plein, merci de selectionner un autre joueur.

Key.Original: Teleporting to selected player, please stand by
Key.English: Teleporting to selected player, please stand by
Key.French: Transport vers le joueur selectionné en cours
